summary: A young woman struggles to move on with her life after the death of her husband, an acclaimed folk singer, when a brash New York writer forces her to confront her loss and the ambiguous circumstances of his death.
cast: Jason Sudeikis|Joe Manganiello|Rebecca Hall|Dianna Agron|Griffin Dunne|Richard Masur|Blythe Danner|Maggie Castle|Alex Quijano|Mary-Bonner Baker|Bates Wilder|Pepper Binkley|Haley Pine|Gabe Gibbs|Zachariah Supka|Meredith Prunty|Melanie Ehrlich|Mark Burzenski|Matthew Delamater|Mary Klug|George J. Vezina|Emily Kokidko|Eddie Resendes|Stanis Krista Ames|Steven Dougherty|Carl 'CJ' Tempesta|Damien Jurado|Josh Gunderson|Tierre Diaz|Hashim Lafond|Graham King|John Hickson|Claire Skowronek|Lindsay Boffoli|Eva Senerchia|Frank Omar|Melissa Jesser|Caroline Cronin|Lewis Robinson|David Boston|Lily Gavin|Rosemary Howard|Stew Replogle|Gary Roscoe
title: La última canción
